About the Company: Devhari Exports (India) Ltd was incorporated on 11/10/1994 with the object to carry on the business as share and brokers, sub-brokers, act as brokers for consultants, underwriter, sub underwriter, brokers to the issue, merchant bankers, market makers, portfolio managers, investment counselors, fixed deposit brokers, financial consultants, financial and discount brokers consultants to the issue, adviser to the issue, and registrars to the issue and share transfer agent. Presently the company is engaged in the business of the trading of steel.
